alert.note: Alert for Grant; Pulaski; Saline (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flash Flood Warning issued September 05 at 6:02PM CDT until September 05 at 7:20PM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: ...FLASH FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 720 PM CDT THIS EVENING FOR NORTHWESTERN GRANT, SOUTH CENTRAL PULASKI AND SOUTHEASTERN SALINE COUNTIES... At 602 PM CDT, local law enforcement reported numerous roads underwater across southern Saline County. Thunderstorms producing heavy rain continue across portions of the warned area. Flash flooding is already occurring and will continue. HAZARD...Flash flooding caused by thunderstorms. SOURCE...Law enforcement reported. IMPACT...Flash flooding of small creeks and streams, urban areas, highways, streets and underpasses as well as other poor drainage and low-lying areas. Some locations that will experience flash flooding include... Little Rock, Benton, Bryant, Southwest Little Rock, Haskell, Shannon Hills, Traskwood, Tull, Prattsville, Poyen, Cane Creek, Salem in Saline County, East End, Otter Creek, Mabelvale, Ironton, Geyer Springs, State Fairgrounds, Alexander and Baseline. FLASH FLOOD...OBSERVED
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
